#Introduction to this project. Read this first!

= UAlbertaBot Introduction =

This is the home of UAlbertaBot, a competitor in the 2010, 2011 and 2012 [http://www.StarCraftAICompetition.com AIIDE StarCraft AI Competition]. 

This wiki will give an overview of the bot, including:
  * Design and structure
  * How to download and compile
  * How to modify to make your own bot
